baseline_groups.claim_summary: Labor market experience has a positive and significant effect on log wages, with diminishing returns (concave wage-experience profile in a Mincerian wage equation).
baseline_groups.notes: Pooled OLS Mincer equation: lw = b0 + b1*e + b2*e^2 + b3*s, robust SEs, no FE. Coefficient b1 ~0.049 (4.9% per year). N=165097.

global_notes: 70 specs total. All positive and highly significant. One spec changes treatment to education (noncore). Six interaction specs classified as heterogeneity. Three functional form specs change coefficient scale.
